verbose_text: And in this study, 8 mM l-isoleucine treatment significantly increased the expressions of TLR3, RIG-I, IRF3, MAVS, MDA5, NF-kappaB, IFNbeta, IFNgamma, pBD2, and pBD3 in IPEC-J2 cells (P < 0.05, Figure XREF_FIG A) and significantly enhanced the expressions of TLR3, RIG-I, IRF3, MAVS, MDA5, NF-kappaB, IFNbeta, and pBD2 in 3D4/31 cells (P < 0.05, Figure XREF_FIG B).
evidence: NF-kappaB, IFNbeta, IFNgamma, pBD2, and pBD3 in IPEC-J2 cells (P < 0.05, Figure  XREF_FIG A) and significantly enhanced the expressions of TLR3, RIG-I, IRF3, MAVS, MDA5, NF-kappaB, IFNbeta, and pBD2
